line_1: Now the general Cry was, All aboard,
line_2: Just as the Men arriv'd, and found their Lord.

line_1: The jolly Soldiers now are got aboard,
line_2: And the auspicious Winds, quick Passage do afford;

line_1: They  hire their Sculler, and when once aboard,
line_2: Grow sick, and damn the Climate — like a Lord,
